author: kencall
body:
Updates are made to HcalSimHitStudy, HcalSimHitsValidation, and SimHitsValidation. These changes extend the updates made in PR #15714. 

Histogram ranges are given in terms of defined constants. 

Additional changes include extending dynamic depths to all 3 modules, adding the testNumber parameter, and adding histograms to sum simhit energy over all depths in a ieta-iphi tower.

attn: @hatakeyamak, @lihux25, @kpedro88, @bsunanda
title: Simhits Validation update
